documents.document: @Sportsfreakconz Bizarre eh? But since he's pissed off about it lets start..... #SleepingIn #50Bucks etc etc etc

@Sportsfreakconz @aotearoaxi Definitely not. Thats further up the order. Its topical, but we shouldnt be relying on them for runs
@aotearoaxi @Sportsfreakconz Agree. He just shouldnt be batting ahead of Wags if the latter is playing
